DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the antiviral efficacy, safety, and tolerability of sofosbuvir (SOF) + ribavirin (RBV) in treatment-naive adults with chronic genotype 1 or 3 hepatitis C virus (HCV) infection.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Sofosbuvir Plus Ribavirin in Treatment-Naive Adults With Chronic Genotype 1 or 3 HCV Infection
